com.interpss.core.dclf.impl

Class DclfSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.interpss.core.algo.impl.BMatrixSolver
      • com.interpss.core.dclf.impl.DclfSolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDclfSolver

    public class DclfSolver
extends BMatrixSolver
implements IDclfSolver
    Solver for dclf and sensitivity analysis injBus |--- monitoring branch ---| withdrawBus - Sensitivity is regarding to an injection bus or an injection bus + a withdraw bus - Branch shifting factor for a monitoring branch is the ratio of the monitoring branch current with regarding the the injection current + withdraw current
